dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2210 IH: Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry Scholarship Improvements Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand the eligibility of children of certain deceased veterans to educational assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry Scholarship Improvements Act of 2013 .

section.header: Entitlement of children of certain deceased veterans to educational assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs

paragraph.text: by striking 2001, dies in line of duty while serving on active duty as a member of the Armed Forces. and inserting 2001—; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraphs:

subparagraph.text: dies in line of duty while serving on active duty as a member of the Armed Forces; or

is awarded the Purple Heart for an injury and dies as a result of that injury during the 60-day period beginning on the date of the person’s discharge or release from active duty service in the Armed Forces.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a person who dies on or after September 11, 2001.
